CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 11, 1962, pg. 14, reads: "Guests At Bethel AME Men's Day - Bishop E.C. Hatcher (extreme right) is seen speaking to the large Men's Day audience at Bethel AME Church recently. Left to right:  D.B. Brunson, the Rev. E.L. Bonner, Birmingham, Ala.; the Rev. John L. Little, Trinity AVE Church, Pittsburgh; J.G. Harris, host pastor, and Bishop Hatcher.  Thomas H. Lee, Bethany Baptist; the Rev. R.H. Reid, Payne Chapel AME, Duquesne, and Leonard E. Brown, president of the Business and Professional Association, are not seen in picture. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Bishop  E. C. Hatcher speaking at podium, with D. B. Brunson, Rev. E. L. Bonner, Rev. John L. Little, and J. G. Harris in background, Bethel AME Church
